package.name: thisisbd/silverstripe-maintenance-mode
package.description: SilverStripe Maintenance Mode Module.  Allows an administrator to put site in offline mode with 503 status to display a 'Coming Soon', 'Under Construction' or 'Down for Maintenance' Page to regular visitors, whilst allowing a logged in admin user to browse and make changes to the site.
